```{r setup, eval = TRUE}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)
```
# Proportion of observations in 95% CrI

```{r}
infiles <-here::here(
    paste0(all_files[[datasource]]$outdir, "/metrics/daily"),
    paste0(places, "_prop_in_ci.csv")
    )
names(infiles) <- places

x <- purrr::map_dfr(
    infiles,
    ~ readr::read_csv(.x, col_names = FALSE),
    .id = "country"
 )

colnames(x) <- c("country", "tproj", "twindow", "prop_in_ci")

```

```{r}
epidemic_phases <- readr::read_csv(
  file = here::here(
    all_files[[datasource]]$outdir,
    paste0(
      datasource,
      "_rquantiles_projection.csv"
    )
  )
)

```

```{r}
prop_in_ci <- dplyr::left_join(
    x,
    epidemic_phases
    )
prop_in_ci$tproj <- as.integer(prop_in_ci$tproj)
prop_in_ci$twindow <- as.integer(prop_in_ci$twindow)

prop_in_ci_by_twindow <- split(prop_in_ci, prop_in_ci$twindow)
```

Pooled acrosss all countries.

```{r}
group_by(prop_in_ci, twindow) %>% summarise(low = quantile(prop_in_ci, 0.25, na.rm = TRUE),
                                            med = quantile(prop_in_ci, 0.5, na.rm = TRUE),
                                            high = quantile(prop_in_ci, 0.75, na.rm = TRUE))

```


For each country
```{r}
group_by(prop_in_ci, country, twindow) %>% summarise(low = quantile(prop_in_ci, 0.25, na.rm = TRUE),
                                            med = quantile(prop_in_ci, 0.5, na.rm = TRUE),
                                            high = quantile(prop_in_ci, 0.75, na.rm = TRUE))

```

By epidemic phase

```{r}
group_by(prop_in_ci, country, twindow, ci) %>%
    summarise(overall = mean(prop_in_ci, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
    tidyr::spread(key = ci, value = overall)


```
